translated: While practicing the perfection of concentration, they bring living beings to full maturity.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed kyang gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma gtogs par bsam gtan gyi 'bras @261b bu gang 'khor bar yongs su spyod par bya ba de lta bu'i 'bras bu la smon pa med do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed kyang gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma gtogs par bsam gtan gyi 'bras @261b bu gang 'khor bar yongs su spyod par bya ba de lta bu'i 'bras bu la smon pa med do //
translated: While they are purifying a buddhafield, they practice the perfection of concentration, except for the fruit of concentration that is to be enjoyed in cyclic existence, in order to protect all living beings and bring them to full maturity.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas shes rab bsgoms te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas shes rab bsgoms te /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom from the time when they first begin arousing the mind of awakening until seated at the site of awakening cultivate wisdom with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de la 'dod chags kyi sems sgrib par mi 'gyur; zhe sdang sgrib par mi 'gyur /🔽gti mug sgrib par mi 'gyur /🔽bag la nyal bsgrib par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: de la 'dod chags kyi sems sgrib par mi 'gyur; zhe sdang sgrib par mi 'gyur / gti mug sgrib par mi 'gyur / bag la nyal bsgrib par mi 'gyur /
translated: it is not obscured by hatred,🔽it is not obscured by delusion,🔽it is not obscured by latent tendencies,

original: kun nas ldang ba bsgrib par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: kun nas ldang ba bsgrib par mi 'gyur te /
translated: and it is not obscured by the arising of afflictions.

original: mi dge ba'i chos gzhan byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba 'di lta ste /
analyzed: mi dge ba'i chos gzhan byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba 'di lta ste /
translated: Other nonvirtuous dharmas that are obstacles to awakening, such as🔽miserliness,

original: ser sna'am / tshul khrims ngan pa'am /
analyzed: ser sna'am / tshul khrims ngan pa'am /
translated: a corrupting moral discipline,

original: 'khrug pa'i sems sam /
analyzed: 'khrug pa'i sems sam /
translated: a disturbed mind,

original: le lo'i sems sam /
analyzed: le lo'i sems sam /
translated: a lazy mind,

original: brtson 'grus chung ba'i sems sam /
analyzed: brtson 'grus chung ba'i sems sam /
translated: a mind of little perseverance,

original: g-yeng ba'i sems sam /
analyzed: g-yeng ba'i sems sam /
translated: a distracted mind,

original: shes rab 'tshal ba'i sems sam /
analyzed: shes rab 'tshal ba'i sems sam /
translated: a mind of dull wisdom,🔽pride,

original: nga rgyal lam /🔽brnyas pa'am / che ba'i nga rgyal lam /
analyzed: nga rgyal lam / brnyas pa'am / che ba'i nga rgyal lam /
translated: contempt,🔽pride in being great,

original: nga'i nga rgyal lam /
analyzed: nga'i nga rgyal lam /
translated: pride in being the best,

original: nyan thos kyi sems sam /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi sems sam /
translated: the mind of a śrāvaka,

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dag kyang sgrib par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dag kyang sgrib par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: or the mind of a pratyekabuddha, do not obscure it.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rab 'byor / de ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ni /
translated: Subhūti,

original: 'di ltar chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes shing /
analyzed: 'di ltar chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes shing /
translated: it is because they know that all dharmas are empty of their own marks.

original: chos thams cad med pa dang / ma byung ba dang / yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang / mngon par ma grub par mthong ste /🔽chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid la 'jug na'ang chos thams cad ni /
analyzed: chos thams cad med pa dang / ma byung ba dang / yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang / mngon par ma grub par mthong ste / chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid la 'jug na'ang chos thams cad ni /
translated: They see all phenomena as nonexistent, as not arisen, as not complete, and as not established.

original: nus pa gang yang med pa'o //
analyzed: nus pa gang yang med pa'o //
translated: Even when they engage with the characteristics of phenomena, they engage with the characteristic of the nonexistence of all phenomena.

original: @262a *// zhes bya bar 'du byed med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis 'jug ste /
analyzed: @262a *// zhes bya bar 'du byed med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis 'jug ste /
translated: They engage with the characteristic of the nonexistence of all phenomena by means of the characteristic of the nonexistence of formations.

original: de thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pas na /🔽dge ba'i rtsa bas rnam par 'phel bar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de /
analyzed: de thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pas na / dge ba'i rtsa bas rnam par 'phel bar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de /
translated: Endowed with such skillful means,🔽they practice the perfection of wisdom while increasing their roots of virtue.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed /
translated: While practicing the perfection of wisdom, they bring sentient beings to maturity.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed kyang gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma gtogs par shes rab kyi 'bras bu gang yongs su spyad par bya ba de lta bu'i 'bras bu la smon pa med do //🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed kyang gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma gtogs par shes rab kyi 'bras bu gang yongs su spyad par bya ba de lta bu'i 'bras bu la smon pa med do // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las /
translated: Although they purify a buddhafield, they do not aspire to any result of wisdom that they might enjoy, except for the sake of protecting all sentient beings and bringing them to maturity, and except for the sake of practicing the perfection of wisdom.

original: le'u lnga bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o ////
analyzed: le'u lnga bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o ////
translated: This was the fifty-eighth chapter, “The Perfection of Wisdom,” in the great sutra of the Heap of Jewels.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug kyang rnam par smin pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug kyang rnam par smin pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings enter into the first concentration but do not appropriate its evolutionary development.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽'di ltar de ni /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / 'di ltar de ni /
translated: Why is that?

original: thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa yin te /
analyzed: thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa yin te /
translated: Because they are skilled in means.

original: thabs mkhas pa des bsam gtan dang po de rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes so //
analyzed: thabs mkhas pa des bsam gtan dang po de rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes so //
translated: With that skill in means they know that the first concentration is empty of its own defining characteristics.

original: med pa dang / ma byung bar shes so //🔽yongs su ma rdzogs par shes so //
analyzed: med pa dang / ma byung bar shes so // yongs su ma rdzogs par shes so //
translated: He knows it to be nonexistent and not arisen.🔽He knows it to be incomplete and not to have come into existence.

original: mngon par ma grub par shes so //
analyzed: mngon par ma grub par shes so //
translated: He knows it to be unproduced.

original: bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang rnam par smin pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang rnam par smin pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He enters the second concentration but does not appropriate its ripening.🔽And why is that?

original: de ci'i phyir @262b zhe na /🔽'di ltar de ni /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir @262b zhe na / 'di ltar de ni /
translated: It is because

original: thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa yin te /
analyzed: thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa yin te /
translated: he is skilled in means.

original: thabs mkhas pa des bsam gtan gnyis pa de rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes so //
analyzed: thabs mkhas pa des bsam gtan gnyis pa de rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes so //
translated: With that skill in means he knows that the second concentration is empty of its own defining characteristics.

original: med pa dang / ma byung bar shes so; ;yongs su ma rdzogs par shes so //
analyzed: med pa dang / ma byung bar shes so; ;yongs su ma rdzogs par shes so //
translated: He knows it to be nonexistent and not arisen. He knows it to be incomplete and not to have come into existence.

original: mngon par ma grub par shes so //
analyzed: mngon par ma grub par shes so //
translated: He knows it to be unproduced.

original: bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang rnam par smin pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang rnam par smin pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He enters the third concentration but does not appropriate its ripening.🔽And why is that?

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na; 'di ltar /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na; 'di ltar /
translated: It is because

original: de ni / thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa yin te /
analyzed: de ni / thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa yin te /
translated: he is skilled in means.

original: thabs mkhas pa des bsam gtan gsum pa de rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes so //
analyzed: thabs mkhas pa des bsam gtan gsum pa de rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes so //
translated: With that skill in means he knows that the third concentration is empty of its own defining characteristics.

original: med pa dang / ma byung bar shes so; ;yongs su ma rdzogs par shes so //
analyzed: med pa dang / ma byung bar shes so; ;yongs su ma rdzogs par shes so //
translated: He knows it to be nonexistent, not arisen,

original: mngon par ma grub par shes so //
analyzed: mngon par ma grub par shes so //
translated: not complete, and not accomplished.

original: bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang rnam par smin pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang rnam par smin pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He enters the fourth concentration but does not appropriate its evolutionary development.🔽And why?

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽'di ltar / de ni /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / 'di ltar / de ni /
translated: Because

original: thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa yin te /
analyzed: thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa yin te /
translated: he is skilled in liberative art.

original: thabs mkhas pa des bsam gtan bzhi pa de rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes so //
analyzed: thabs mkhas pa des bsam gtan bzhi pa de rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes so //
translated: By that liberative art he knows that the fourth concentration is empty of the intrinsic identity of the fourth concentration.

original: med pa dang / ma byung bar shes so //
analyzed: med pa dang / ma byung bar shes so //
translated: He knows it to be nonexistent, not arisen,

original: yongs su ma rdzogs par shes so //🔽mngon par ma grub par shes so //
analyzed: yongs su ma rdzogs par shes so // mngon par ma grub par shes so //
translated: not complete, and not accomplished.

original: byams pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang rnam par smin pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: byams pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang rnam par smin pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He enters the sphere of infinite space, but does not appropriate its evolutionary development.🔽And why?

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na; 'di ltar /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na; 'di ltar /
translated: Because

original: de ni / thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa yin te /
analyzed: de ni / thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa yin te /
translated: he is skilled in liberative art.

original: thabs mkhas pa des byams pa de rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes so //
analyzed: thabs mkhas pa des byams pa de rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes so //
translated: By that liberative art he knows that the sphere of infinite space is empty of the intrinsic identity of the sphere of infinite space.

original: med pa dang / ma byung bar shes so //🔽yongs su @263a *//
analyzed: med pa dang / ma byung bar shes so // yongs su @263a *//
translated: He knows that it does not exist, and that it does not arise.

original: ma rdzogs par shes so //
analyzed: ma rdzogs par shes so //
translated: He knows that it is not complete,

original: mngon par ma grub par shes so //
analyzed: mngon par ma grub par shes so //
translated: and that it is not something that has come into being.

original: snying rje la snyoms par 'jug kyang rnam par smin pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: snying rje la snyoms par 'jug kyang rnam par smin pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: Even though he enters into the meditative absorption of compassion, he does not appropriate its evolutionary development.🔽And why is that?

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽'di ltar / de ni /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / 'di ltar / de ni /
translated: Because

original: thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa yin te /
analyzed: thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa yin te /
translated: he is skilled in liberative art.

original: thabs mkhas pa des snying rje de rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes so //
analyzed: thabs mkhas pa des snying rje de rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes so //
translated: By means of that liberative art, he knows that compassion is empty of essence,

original: med pa dang / ma byung bar shes so //
analyzed: med pa dang / ma byung bar shes so //
translated: that it does not exist, and that it does not arise.

original: yongs su ma rdzogs par shes so //
analyzed: yongs su ma rdzogs par shes so //
translated: He knows that it is not complete,

original: mngon par ma grub par shes so //
analyzed: mngon par ma grub par shes so //
translated: and that it is not something that has come into being.

original: dga' ba la snyoms par 'jug kyang rnam par smin pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: dga' ba la snyoms par 'jug kyang rnam par smin pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: Even though he enters into the meditative absorption of joy, he does not appropriate its evolutionary development.🔽And why is that?

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽'di ltar / de ni /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / 'di ltar / de ni /
translated: Because

original: thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa yin te /
analyzed: thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa yin te /
translated: he is skilled in liberative art.

original: thabs mkhas pa des dga' ba de rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes so //
analyzed: thabs mkhas pa des dga' ba de rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes so //
translated: By means of that liberative art, he knows that joy is empty of essence,

original: med pa dang / ma byung bar shes so //
analyzed: med pa dang / ma byung bar shes so //
translated: that it does not exist, and that it does not arise.

original: yongs su ma rdzogs par shes so; ;mngon par ma grub par shes so //
analyzed: yongs su ma rdzogs par shes so; ;mngon par ma grub par shes so //
translated: He knows it to be incomplete, and not to be fully accomplished.

original: btang snyoms la snyoms par 'jug kyang rnam par smin pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: btang snyoms la snyoms par 'jug kyang rnam par smin pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He enters the sphere of infinite space, but does not appropriate its evolutionary development.🔽And why?

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽'di ltar / de ni /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / 'di ltar / de ni /

original: thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa yin te /
analyzed: thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa yin te /
translated: he is skilled in liberative art.

original: thabs mkhas pa des btang snyoms de rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes so //
analyzed: thabs mkhas pa des btang snyoms de rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes so //
translated: By that liberative art he knows that sphere of infinite space to be empty of the essential nature of the sphere of infinite space.

original: med pa dang / ma byung bar shes so //
analyzed: med pa dang / ma byung bar shes so //
translated: He knows it to be insubstantial, not to arise,

original: yongs su ma rdzogs par shes so //🔽mngon par ma grub par shes so //
analyzed: yongs su ma rdzogs par shes so // mngon par ma grub par shes so //
translated: to be incomplete,🔽and not to be fully accomplished.

original: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang rnam par smin pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang rnam par smin pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He enters the sphere of infinite consciousness, but does not appropriate its evolutionary development.🔽And why?

original: de @263b ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽'di ltar / de ni /
analyzed: de @263b ci'i phyir zhe na / 'di ltar / de ni /
translated: Because

original: thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa yin te /
analyzed: thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa yin te /
translated: he is skilled in liberative art.

original: thabs mkhas pa des nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched de rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes so //
analyzed: thabs mkhas pa des nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched de rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes so //
translated: By that liberative art he knows that sphere of infinite consciousness to be empty of the essential nature of the sphere of infinite consciousness.

original: med pa dang / ma byung bar shes so //🔽yongs su ma rdzogs par shes so //
analyzed: med pa dang / ma byung bar shes so // yongs su ma rdzogs par shes so //
translated: He knows it to be nonexistent and not to arise.

original: mngon par ma grub par shes so //
analyzed: mngon par ma grub par shes so //
translated: He knows it to be incomplete and not to be manifest.

original: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang rnam par smin pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang rnam par smin pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He enters the meditative absorption of the sense field of infinite consciousness, but does not appropriate its evolutionary development.🔽And why is that?

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽'di ltar / de ni /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / 'di ltar / de ni /
translated: Because

original: thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa yin te /
analyzed: thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa yin te /
translated: he is skilled in means.

original: thabs mkhas pa des rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched de rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes so //
analyzed: thabs mkhas pa des rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched de rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes so //
translated: By that skill in means he knows that the sense field of infinite consciousness is empty of its own defining characteristics,

original: med pa dang / ma byung bar shes so //🔽yongs su ma rdzogs par shes so //
analyzed: med pa dang / ma byung bar shes so // yongs su ma rdzogs par shes so //
translated: he knows it to be nonexistent and not to arise.

original: mngon par ma grub par shes so //
analyzed: mngon par ma grub par shes so //
translated: He knows it to be incomplete and not to be manifest.

original: cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang rnam par smin pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang rnam par smin pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He enters the meditative absorption of the sense field of nothing-at-all, but does not appropriate its evolutionary development.🔽And why is that?

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽'di ltar / de ni /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / 'di ltar / de ni /
translated: Because

original: thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa yin te /
analyzed: thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa yin te /
translated: he is skilled in means.

original: thabs mkhas pa des cung zad med pa'i skye mched de rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes so //
analyzed: thabs mkhas pa des cung zad med pa'i skye mched de rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes so //
translated: By that skillful means, he knows that the sphere of nothing whatsoever is empty of its own mark.

original: med pa dang / ma byung bar shes so //
analyzed: med pa dang / ma byung bar shes so //
translated: He knows it as nonexistent and as non-arisen.

original: yongs su ma rdzogs par shes so //
analyzed: yongs su ma rdzogs par shes so //
translated: He knows it as incomplete and as unproduced.

original: mngon par ma grub par shes so //
analyzed: mngon par ma grub par shes so //
translated: He knows it as not to be attained.

original: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang /
analyzed: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang /
translated: He enters the meditative absorption of the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception,

original: rnam par smin pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: but does not appropriate its evolutionary development.🔽And why is that?

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽'di ltar / de ni /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / 'di ltar / de ni /
translated: Because

original: thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa yin te /
analyzed: thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa yin te /
translated: he is endowed with skillful means.

original: thabs @264a *// mkhas pa des 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched de rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes so //
analyzed: thabs @264a *// mkhas pa des 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched de rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes so //
translated: By that skillful means, he knows that the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception is empty of its own mark.

original: med pa dang / ma byung bar shes so //
analyzed: med pa dang / ma byung bar shes so //
translated: He knows it as nonexistent and as non-arisen.

original: yongs su ma rdzogs par shes so //
analyzed: yongs su ma rdzogs par shes so //
translated: He knows it as incomplete and as unproduced.

original: mngon par ma grub par shes so //
analyzed: mngon par ma grub par shes so //
translated: He knows it as not to be attained.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas mthong ba dang / sgom pas spang ba'i lam la spyod kyang /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas mthong ba dang / sgom pas spang ba'i lam la spyod kyang /
translated: Furthermore, Subhūti, from the time when the bodhisattva great being first produces the thought, he practices the path of seeing and the path of cultivation with skill in means.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par mi byed /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par mi byed /
translated: He does not attain the fruit of stream enterer.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par mi byed /
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par mi byed /
translated: He does not attain the fruit of once-returner.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par mi byed /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par mi byed /
translated: He does not attain the fruit of non-returner.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid thob par mi byed /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid thob par mi byed /
translated: He does not attain the state of a worthy one.

original: rang byang chub thob par mi byed do //
analyzed: rang byang chub thob par mi byed do //
translated: He does not attain a pratyekabuddha’s awakening.🔽Why is that?

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽'di ltar / de ni /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / 'di ltar / de ni /
translated: Because

original: chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes /
analyzed: chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes /
translated: he knows that all phenomena are empty of their own marks.

original: chos thams cad med pa dang / ma byung ba dang / yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang / mngon par ma grub par shes te /
analyzed: chos thams cad med pa dang / ma byung ba dang / yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang / mngon par ma grub par shes te /
translated: He knows that all phenomena are nonexistent, do not arise, are not completed, and are not actualized.

original: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos de dag la spyod cing nyan thos kyi sa las yongs su 'da'/
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos de dag la spyod cing nyan thos kyi sa las yongs su 'da'/
translated: Practicing those factors of awakening, they transcend the level of the hearers.

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las yongs su 'da' ste /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las yongs su 'da' ste /
translated: Practicing those dharmas on the side of awakening, they transcend the śrāvaka level and they transcend the pratyekabuddha level.

original: rab 'byor / 'di ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ni /
translated: Subhūti, this

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa'o //
translated: is the bodhisattva great beings’ patience with nonproduction.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam par thar pa brgyad la snyoms @264b par 'jug kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par mi byed /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam par thar pa brgyad la snyoms @264b par 'jug kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par mi byed /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom are absorbed in the eight deliverances, they do not attain the result of stream enterer,

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par mi byed /
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par mi byed /
translated: they do not attain the result of once-returner,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par mi byed /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par mi byed /
translated: they do not attain the result of non-returner,

original: dgra bcom pa nyid thob par mi byed /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid thob par mi byed /
translated: they do not attain the state of a worthy one,

original: rang byang chub thob par mi byed do //
analyzed: rang byang chub thob par mi byed do //
translated: and they do not attain a pratyekabuddha’s awakening.🔽And why?

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽'di ltar / de ni /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽'di ltar / de ni /
translated: Because

original: chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes so //
analyzed: chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes so //
translated: they know that all phenomena are empty of their own marks;

original: chos thams cad med pa dang / ma byung bar shes so //
analyzed: chos thams cad med pa dang / ma byung bar shes so //
translated: they know that all phenomena are nonexistent and do not occur;

original: chos thams cad yongs su ma rdzogs par shes so //
analyzed: chos thams cad yongs su ma rdzogs par shes so //
translated: they know that all phenomena are incomplete;

original: chos thams cad mngon par ma grub par shes so //
analyzed: chos thams cad mngon par ma grub par shes so //
translated: they know that all phenomena are unproduced;

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par mi byed /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par mi byed /
translated: “Moreover, Su­bhūti, when great bodhisattva beings who practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom are absorbed in the nine serial steps of meditative equipoise, they do not attain the fruit of entering the stream;

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par mi byed /
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par mi byed /
translated: they do not attain the fruit of being tied to one more rebirth;

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par mi byed /🔽dgra bcom pa nyid thob par mi byed de /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par mi byed / dgra bcom pa nyid thob par mi byed de /
translated: they do not attain the fruit of no longer being subject to rebirth;🔽they do not attain arhatship;

original: rang byang chub thob par mi byed do //
analyzed: rang byang chub thob par mi byed do //
translated: and they do not attain individual enlightenment.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na; 'di ltar /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na; 'di ltar /
translated: If you ask why, it is because

original: de ni / chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes so //
analyzed: de ni / chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes so //
translated: He knows that all phenomena are empty of their own marks.

original: chos thams cad med pa dang / ma byung bar shes so //
analyzed: chos thams cad med pa dang / ma byung bar shes so //
translated: He knows that all phenomena are nonexistent and do not arise.🔽He knows that all phenomena are incomplete and not fully accomplished.

original: chos thams cad yongs su ma rdzogs par shes so; ;chos thams cad mngon par ma grub par shes so //
analyzed: chos thams cad yongs su ma rdzogs par shes so; ;chos thams cad mngon par ma grub par shes so //
translated: He knows that all phenomena are unproduced.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la yongs su 'dris @265a *//
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la yongs su 'dris @265a *//
translated: “Moreover, Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings should be familiar with the ten tathāgata powers,

original: par byed / mi 'jigs pa bzhi la yongs su 'dris par byed /
analyzed: par byed / mi 'jigs pa bzhi la yongs su 'dris par byed /
translated: should be familiar with the four fearlessnesses,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la yongs su 'dris par byed /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la yongs su 'dris par byed /
translated: should be familiar with the four detailed and thorough knowledges,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yongs su 'dris par byed /🔽byams pa chen po la yongs su 'dris par byed /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yongs su 'dris par byed / byams pa chen po la yongs su 'dris par byed /
translated: should be familiar with the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha,🔽should be familiar with great love,

original: snying rje chen po la yongs su 'dris par byed /
analyzed: snying rje chen po la yongs su 'dris par byed /
translated: and should be familiar with great compassion.

original: nam sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par ma gyur pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par ma gyur gyi bar du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi byed do //
analyzed: nam sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par ma gyur pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par ma gyur gyi bar du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi byed do //
translated: Until the Buddha-field is purified and beings are matured, they do not attain the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o //
translated: Subhūti, bodhisattva-mahāsattvas should practice the perfection of wisdom like this.🔽Subhūti said,

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bu'i chos zab mo dag la spyod kyang rnam par smin pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bu'i chos zab mo dag la spyod kyang rnam par smin pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa ni /
translated: the bodhisattva-mahāsattvas who practice such profound dharmas but do not grasp at karmic maturation

original: blo dam pa dang ldan pa lags so //
analyzed: blo dam pa dang ldan pa lags so //
translated: are endowed with the highest intelligence.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
translated: Subhūti, it is so,

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: it is just as you have said.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de lta bu'i chos zab mo dag la spyod cing rnam par smin pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de lta bu'i chos zab mo dag la spyod cing rnam par smin pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa ni /
translated: The bodhisattva-mahāsattvas who practice such profound dharmas but do not grasp at karmic maturation

original: blo dam pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: blo dam pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: and is endowed with the highest wisdom.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is it so?

original: rab 'byor; de ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor; de ni /
translated: Subhūti,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: it is because the bodhisattva great beings do not move from their essential nature.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: ” Subhūti said, “Blessed One,

original: ngo bo nyid gang las mi g-yo ba lags /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid gang las mi g-yo ba lags /
translated: from what essential nature do they not move?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis @265b bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis @265b bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: dngos po med pa las mi g-yo ba yin te /
analyzed: dngos po med pa las mi g-yo ba yin te /
translated: “They do not move from the essential nature of non-entity.

original: rab 'byor / gang yang 'di skad du ngo bo nyid gang las mi g-yo zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gang yang 'di skad du ngo bo nyid gang las mi g-yo zhes zer ba ni /
translated: Subhūti, when you ask, ‘From what essential nature do they not move?’

original: gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //🔽tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o // tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: they do not move from the essential nature of form.🔽They do not move from the essential nature of feeling.

original: 'du shes kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: 'du shes kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: They do not move from the essential nature of perception.

original: 'du byed kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: They do not move from the essential nature of formation.

original: rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //🔽mig gi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o // mig gi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: They do not move from the essential nature of consciousness.🔽They do not move from the essential nature of the eyes.

original: rna ba'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //🔽sna'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o // sna'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: They do not move from the essential nature of the ears.🔽They do not move from the essential nature of the nose.

original: lce'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: lce'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: They do not move from the essential nature of the tongue.

original: lus kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: lus kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: They do not move from the essence of the body.

original: yid kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: yid kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: They do not move from the essence of the mind.

original: gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //🔽sgra'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o // sgra'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: They do not move from the essence of form.🔽They do not move from the essence of sound.

original: dri'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //🔽ro'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: dri'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o // ro'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: They do not move from the essence of smell.🔽They do not move from the essence of taste.

original: reg gi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o /
analyzed: reg gi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o /
translated: They do not move from the essence of touch.

original: chos kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: chos kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: They do not move from the essence of phenomena.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: They do not move from the essence of eye consciousness.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //🔽sna'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o // sna'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: They do not move from the essence of ear consciousness.🔽They do not move from the essence of nose consciousness.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: They do not move from the essence of tongue consciousness.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: They do not move from the essence of body consciousness.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o /
translated: They do not move from the essence of mind consciousness.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: They do not move from the essence of eye contact.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: they do not move from the essence of the contact that is the coming together of ear,

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //🔽lce'i 'dus te @266a *//🔽reg pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o // lce'i 'dus te @266a *// reg pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: they do not move from the essence of the contact that is the coming together of nose,🔽they do not move from the essence of the contact that is the coming together of tongue,

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: they do not move from the essence of the contact that is the coming together of body,

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: they do not move from the essence of the contact that is the coming together of mind.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: They do not move from the essence of the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact that is the coming together of eye,🔽they do not move from the essence of the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact that is the coming together of ear,🔽they do not move from the essence of the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact that is the coming together of nose,

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: they do not move from the essence of the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact that is the coming together of tongue,🔽they do not move from the essence of the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact that is the coming together of body,

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o; ;yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o; ;yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: He does not move from the essential nature of the feeling that arises from the condition of contact through the union of the eye, form, and consciousness. He does not move from the essential nature of the feeling that arises from the condition of contact through the union of the ear, sound, and consciousness. He does not move from the essential nature of the feeling that arises from the condition of contact through the union of the nose, smell, and consciousness. He does not move from the essential nature of the feeling that arises from the condition of contact through the union of the tongue, taste, and consciousness. He does not move from the essential nature of the feeling that arises from the condition of contact through the union of the body, touch, and consciousness. He does not move from the essential nature of the feeling that arises from the condition of contact through the union of the mind, phenomena, and consciousness.

original: sa'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: sa'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: He does not move from the essential nature of the earth element.

original: chu'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: chu'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: He does not move from the essential nature of the water element.

original: me'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //🔽rlung gi khams kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: me'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o // rlung gi khams kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: He does not move from the essential nature of the fire element.🔽He does not move from the essential nature of the wind element.

original: nam mkha'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //🔽rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o // rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: He does not move from the essential nature of the space element.🔽He does not move from the essential nature of the consciousness element.

original: ma rig pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: ma rig pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: He does not move from the essential nature of ignorance.

original: 'du byed kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: He does not move from the essential nature of volitional factors.

original: rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: He does not move from the essential nature of consciousness.

original: ming dang gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: He does not move from the essential nature of name and form.

original: skye mched drug gi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: skye mched drug gi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: He does not move from the essential nature of the six sense fields.

original: reg pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: reg pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: He does not move from the essential nature of contact.

original: tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //🔽sred pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi @266b g-yo'o //
analyzed: tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o // sred pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi @266b g-yo'o //
translated: they do not move from the essential nature of feeling;🔽they do not move from the essential nature of craving;

original: len pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //🔽srid pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: len pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o // srid pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: they do not move from the essential nature of appropriation;🔽they do not move from the essential nature of existence;

original: skye ba'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: skye ba'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: they do not move from the essential nature of birth;

original: rga shi'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: rga shi'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: they do not move from the essential nature of old age and death;

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: they do not move from the essential nature of the perfection of giving;

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: they do not move from the essential nature of the perfection of morality;🔽they do not move from the essential nature of the perfection of patience;

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: they do not move from the essential nature of the perfection of perseverance;

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: they do not move from the essential nature of the perfection of concentration;

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: they do not move from the essential nature of the perfection of wisdom;

original: nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: they do not move from the essential nature of inner emptiness;

original: phyi stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: they do not move from the essence of external emptiness;

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: they do not move from the essence of internal and external emptiness;

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: they do not move from the essence of the emptiness of emptiness;

original: chen po stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: they do not move from the essence of great emptiness;

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o // 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: they do not move from the essence of ultimate emptiness;🔽they do not move from the essence of conditioned emptiness;

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: they do not move from the essence of unconditioned emptiness;🔽they do not move from the essence of the emptiness of what is beyond extremes;

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o; ;dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o; ;dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: they do not move from the essence of the emptiness of what is not to be discarded;

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: they do not move from the essence of the emptiness of inherent existence;🔽and they do not move from the essence of the emptiness of all things.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: they do not move from the essence of the emptiness of all phenomena;

original: @267a *// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: @267a *// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: they do not move from the essence of the emptiness of its own mark;🔽they do not move from the essence of the emptiness of nonapprehension;

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: they do not move from the essence of the emptiness of nonthings;🔽they do not move from the essence of the emptiness of essential nature;

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: they do not move from the essence of the emptiness of the essential nature of nonthings;

original: bsam gtan rnams kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: they do not move from the essence of the meditative stabilizations;

original: tshad med pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //🔽gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o // gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: they do not move from the essence of the immeasurable;🔽they do not move from the essence of the formless absorptions;

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: they do not move from the essence of the applications of mindfulness;

original: yang dag par sbong ba rnams kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: yang dag par sbong ba rnams kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: they do not move from the essence of the right efforts;

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: they do not move from the real nature of the bases of supernatural powers;

original: dbang po rnams kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: dbang po rnams kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: they do not move from the real nature of the faculties;

original: stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: they do not move from the real nature of the powers;

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: they do not move from the real nature of the limbs of awakening;

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: they do not move from the real nature of the path;

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: they do not move from the real nature of the noble truths;

original: stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //🔽mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o // mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: they do not move from the real nature of the emptiness meditative stabilization;🔽they do not move from the real nature of the signless meditative stabilization;

original: smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: they do not move from the real nature of the wishless meditative stabilization;

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: they do not move from the real nature of the eight deliverances;

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms @267b par 'jug pa dgu'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms @267b par 'jug pa dgu'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: they do not move from the real nature of the nine serial meditative stabilizations;

original: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: they do not move from the essential nature of the superknowledges;

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: they do not move from the essential nature of the meditative stabilizations;

analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: they do not move from the essential nature of the dhāraṇī gateways;

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //

analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //

analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: they do not move from the essential nature of the four detailed and thorough knowledges;

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o // byams pa chen po'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: they do not move from the essential nature of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha;🔽they do not move from the essential nature of great love;🔽they do not move from the essential nature of great compassion.

original: snying rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o; ;de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o; ;de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

analyzed: rab 'byor / de ni /

analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das / ci lags / dngos po mchis pas /

translated: then it is clear that a real basis does not realize a nonexistent basis,🔽and a nonexistent basis does not realize a real basis.

translated: When bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom, they do not project or proliferate the idea that form is permanent or impermanent.

analyzed: 'du byed rtag pa dang mi rtag ces bya bar mi spro ba 'phro bar mi byed do //
